description: Lists the input commitment modifications associated with a bill estimate.

parameters.name: billEstimateId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill estimate to list input commitment modifications for.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The list of input commitment modifications associated with the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the commitment modification.

nested_items.name: group
nested_items.description: The group identifier for the commitment modification.

nested_items.name: usageAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with this commitment modification.

nested_items.name: commitmentAction
nested_items.description: The specific commitment action taken in this modification.

nested_items.name: addReservedInstanceAction
nested_items.description: Action to add a Reserved Instance to the scenario.

nested_items.name: reservedInstancesOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance offering to add. For more information, see DescribeReservedInstancesOfferings.

nested_items.name: instanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances to add for this Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: addSavingsPlanAction
nested_items.description: Action to add a Savings Plan to the scenario.

nested_items.name: savingsPlanOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Savings Plan offering to add. For more information, see DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings.

nested_items.name: commitment
nested_items.description: The hourly commitment, in the same currency of the savingsPlanOfferingId. This is a value between 0.001 and 1 million. You cannot specify more than five digits after the decimal point.

nested_items.name: negateReservedInstanceAction
nested_items.description: Action to remove a Reserved Instance from the scenario.

nested_items.name: reservedInstancesId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance to remove.

nested_items.name: negateSavingsPlanAction
nested_items.description: Action to remove a Savings Plan from the scenario.

nested_items.name: savingsPlanId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Savings Plan to remove.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to retrieve the next page of results, if any.
